channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 07:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 7, 04:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 17/03/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/03/2025 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack E101 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack E101 to racks E103 and E105.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101A19/B08/B11/B12
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 20, 07:00 - 10:00 UTC

Feb 3, 12:39 UTC
Update - Operations on this maintenance have been postponed to a later date.

Below is the new schedule:
Start time : 20/02/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/02/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will migrate servers one by one from racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 to rack E105A08.

item.title: [RBX8][Bare Metal Cloud] - Rack R806R04 incident notification
item.description:
Feb 14, 03:15 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Almost all the servers are operational again.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 13, 20:10 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Bare Metal Cloud offer on the specific rack.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 13/02/2025 20:02 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the rack R806R04 are no longer responding
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
